name: loconundrum
description:
Get the full version! What

This project is in active development! You can get access to new versions of it every week by subbing to any tier of my Patreon. Weekly updates have new images to assemble + quality of life improvements that are part of the development process.

Plans

Will be available for mobile + desktop. This page will have the limited version of the game available until release. New updates + devlog every Thursday. Patreon supporters get access to updates + full game upon release. Some tiers will also get access to the source code of the project!

Contribute
  • Submit your own color palette to be included in the game using this tool.
  • Suggest new images and features to add to the game in the discussion below.
  • Join the Discord where I post regular updates or follow me on Twitter where I do the same!
